inputs.sentence: Son-in-law, is it yours? No, it's step-father's...

outputs.sentence: Daughter-in-law, is it yours? No, it's step-mother's...

inputs.sentence: This sentence contains no gendered keywords and will remain unchannged.

outputs.sentence: This sentence contains no gendered keywords and will remain unchannged.

inputs.sentence: {name} wants to be a programmer, as his father.

outputs.sentence: {name} wants to be a programmer, as her mother.
